tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We first met Dr.Vibha when we were planning for a child and she explained in details the calculation and how we should have an appropriate lifestyle to get the maximum benefit.Following her advice, within 2 months we were visiting her again, this time with a positive pregnancy test. The journey was about to see new roads, feel excitement and get to know the best Doctor ever that one can have.I had several issues in the earlier months which were severe but the smile, positive energy, treatment and guidance by Vibha Ma'am helped me overcome all obstacles during these crucial times. She is a doctor who is at the patient's service 24x7.She has called me herself, reminding me of what needs to be done from time to time, checking on my health which I could never expect any doctor to do.To me she has become just not my Doctor but her behaviour has made me think of her as someone from my own family.That is how she takes care of her patients.At the end of my pregnancy, when it was an extremely critical situation, such that I could have lost my baby forever,due to sudden internal complications, Ma'am took the right decision at the right time, even when the reports couldn't detect the issue. She saved my baby's life by her prompt decision and action and has blessed my life with a bundle of joy.Even after the delivery, Vibha Ma'am has taken such good care of me all the time.She has always placed my life and best interest before anything else. I am blessed to have Vibha Arora in my life .She is my God send Angel.Can never thank her enough and Thank you can never suffice for what she has done for me.
reply_text: Thanks a lot for your kind words,it is true that in the journey we do get connected to our patients and they our like family.May you'll be blessed as a family always.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: To start of, I could have not found a better doctor than her. Dr Vibha Arora is amazing doctor.  She is very humble, polite & friendly. I like the sincerity and value of time she gave to me. During my entire pregnancy, she was constantly in touch with me through what's app and calls and checking on my health and reminding me what is needed to be done from time to time. she took care of even the slightest problems of low hameoglobin, infections, gastric issue etc. she made sure everything was perfect. the way she talks and took care of me made me feel she was my family member.. And I was very comfortable with her in sharing all my worries & problems..she was very positive & always gave me a positive feeling on every follow up & visit..At the end of my pregnancy when my baby stopped gaining weight, she took right decision at right time and made sure to explain each and every point before delivery. she simply knew what was best for me.!We are thankful to her for guidance and support during this pandemic time. This pregnancy was beautiful and memorable for me just because of her care and support..!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
They say that surgery is as smooth as your trust in the surgeon. Well, Dr. Vibha made it so easy for us to trust with her simplicity and clarity of explanation from the very first visit. 
I had been ailing for almost 3 years with a menopausal condition (endometriosis and fibroids and else). I had delayed further cos of the pandemic. 
Dr. Vibha Arora put our fears at ease as she specified the path of treatment I needed to take. She ensured I was mentally, emotionally and physically prepped for the  initial DNC and then later the lap-hysterectomy and for all the tests in between. 
I have paid up for the surgery and procedures but I shall always be in her debt for the kindness showed ~ she replied to my every call and even whatsapp and was very meticulous and gentle yet confident in her approach. She is extremely patient with her patients (I've overheard her talking with others in the hospital) 
My surgery was challenging and complicated and yet I am healing and free. 
I would definitely recommend Dr. Vibha to anyone with a gyanec situation along with a piece of advice - Ladies, please do not delay. Give yourself priority and make time for self care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I was under Dr Vibha’s consultation for my pregnancy. Dr Vibha showed genuine care throughout.

Me and my husband, being generally curious and first time pregnant, had plenty of queries at every stage. Dr Vibha always listened and answered our questions with warmth, patience and the scientific details that we were looking for.

Dr Vibha was approachable and available in emergency, which was especially important as my office work required me to travel between cities almost every week. Once during my 2nd trimester while I was out for shopping I had an emergency - debilitating chest and back pain, sweating and chills due to hypotension. Dr Vibha guided my husband on phone on how to alleviate my condition which helped me get back to normal. Despite it being a Sunday and me having returned to normal, Dr Vibha travelled to hospital so that she could see me. On another occasion when I was out of Mumbai for work I had similar problem. Yet again Dr Vibha was constantly in touch over phone until my situation came back to normal.

In last two weeks of pregnancy one of my placental metric was abnormally high. During this time as well Dr Vibha provided great care. I had a very good delivery experience with her. We feel blessed to have had such a capable and good natured doctor in our pregnancy journey.
reply_text: Thanks for the kind words,it was so nice to see you'll as a family and safety and happiness of our pts gives us immense satisfaction.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
She is an experienced Dr who treats her patient with smile and motherly care that makes the patient half well at the moment. We have a wonderful journey with her till delivery of a Baby boy at and therefater discharge from the hospital. 
She explains each and everything minutely till the patient is satisfied and answer all the queries. She is very open and Frank about the health condition of her patients and give proper advice the accordingly. 

In my case, Post operative recovery had an electrolyte imbalance that caused post surgery Potassium drop which happens in few post operative patients but it was managed well and she handled the situation with patience. Even She didn't hesitate to take expert advice. She went last mile in my case to save the life. 
We are vey thankful to her. Wonderful thing is that she keeps the patient in mind and and even make a phone call to the patient to take stock of the situation of the health. She is readily available on phone call in case of any emergency. 
After discharge I did not face any problem post surgery.
reply_text: We feel happy only when both mother and baby are fine and since pregnancy is a journey we do feel connected to our pts and wish their best.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I am Shailendra Singh.
Here I want to share pregnancy journey of my wife.She lost her first pregnancy in 2016, then doctors told her that whenever she will conceive she will be  needing stitches.In 2019 she conceived and doctor's said that stitches are mandatory for her.
We were not able to understand why every doctor was advising stitches as her cervix length was good,Then fortunately we met Dr.Vibha Arora Maam,She told her that stitches are not required ,she has gone through all her reports and explained us each and everything in detail.During our  first meeting with her we developed the confidence that She is the one with whom we will proceed our beautiful journey of bringing the divine soul into this world.After that my wife faced some complications related to pregnancy like urine infection,increase in sgot,sgpt nd increase in sugar(post lunch) but Dr.Vibha Arora Maam handled everything very positively.She was available 24/7 for us and took care of my wife like her Mother.She always had valid reasoning for her decisions.She is very experienced and qualified gynecologist who is also very  generous.
May be during 40 weeks of pregnancy you people might think why she is saying this or that but I advice everyone to follow her blindly .In short She is an angel for us and today by God's grace we are happy parents.
After my wife's delivery, our Doctor is still in touch with us and solve her problems in this lockdown situation through whatsapp.Well for my wife it was a musical delivery because during the process to keep the environment friendly and comfortable Doctor Vibha sang a song which was so soothing for her She could bear all the pain with that melodious voice.

Thank you so much Maam for evrything.
reply_text: Thanks a lot for your kind words and we will always keep your wellbeing in mind while taking any decision.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Cloudnine has been an amazing experience for me and my wife . We initially thought of going to a multispecialty hospital but experiencing the service there we decided against it . At Cloudnine we began our consulting journey with Dr. Vibha Arora who is extremely sharp and goes the extra mile to ensure her patient has the most informed pregnancy. Dr . Vibha is an angel of sorts and has been our biggest pillar of support away from our family in Mumbai . Our pregnancy journey was not the smoothest but Dr. Vibha managed each and every exigency with elan and with the kind warmth which is her most remarkable aspect . We would be forever grateful to her and the hospital for the ultimate care and ensuring the well being of our newborn daughter .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I was fortunate to have Dr. Vibha Arora as my gynaec last year. She ensured to make me feel at ease throughout the entire duration of my pregnancy and delivery. She has always been very responsive to all my questions and addressing all my concerns in a calm and timely manner.

Dr. Vibha’s care and concern is truly unmatched. Her prescribed diet plan during my pregnancy helped me get back to my pre-pregnancy weight within a week after my delivery. 

With whole heart, we thank Dr. Vibha for helping us with the most wonderful phase of our life !!! 

-Shubhangi & Nitin

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Vibha Arora has been an integral part of my pregnancy journey. She is very friendly and approachable. She calmly listens and suggests the best possible treatments. With her energetic and cheerful smile she brings in a lot of positivity and that is reflected in her caring nature. In spite of her busy schedule she is always approachable. I want to say a special 'Thank You' for all her efforts she has put specially during the third trimester. I would highly recommend her to my family and friends.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We consulted Dr Vibha Arora, A Gynecologist at cloudnine hospitals. I have to say she is amazing. It is extremely important to trust your doctor, and Dr Vibha won our trust in no time.Very talented doctor who gave the line of treatement considering all possibilities and dangers in mind. The way she explained everything is really commendable. 

Another important strength of Dr Vibha is her Patient Care and Patient first attitude. She would know what questions you may have or what fears you may have pertaining to the illness. She responds accordingly clearing all your doubts making you super comfortable. 

I have to say she is an Angel at heart. She comforted us so well. She is the best person to talk to when you are stressed. And she will be available for you even during odd hours if she feels the need for same. So I felt I was in safe hands.

I strongly recommend Dr Vibha Arora ** *** ** *** **** ************ * **** **** ** ****

review: Dr.vibha has been genuinely concerned since the beginning as i had short cervix issue, and has proactively followed up with me with regards to my and baby’s health, shez extremely kind,polite, when we came to dr.vibha we knew that we are in safe hands as we had changed 2 doctors before her. I have delivered a beautiful baby girl and me and my husband are eternally grateful to dr.vibha. She is very caring i would definitely recommend her.. thankyou dr.vibha for all the things that u hve done fr us.. love u🙏🏻😄
reply_text: I will always remember your journey and it's because of the trust we are able to do our best .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Vibha Arora is a wonderful person. She explained my health issues to me in a very simple language. She shared her phone number and was available to meet or talk anytime I needed her. She also suggested me a healthy diet which has completely transformed me into a totally new person. She was always there to motivate me whether it was my new diet or my surgery. She was always in touch with me even post surgery. Because of her kind words I always felt that I am in safe hands and I never got scared of the surgery. Thank you Dr. Vibha for being so patient, kind and motivating to me and my family.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Doctor Vibha Arora is magician for me. I was suffering from menopausal issues along with vaginal infection for more than 5 months. I had been to 3 different doctors and non of them could recognise real issue.
With Doctor Veebha's treatment my problem resolved within a month's time.
Not only right diagnosis and correct medications, but also her soft approach and her way of treating me with lots of concern and care helped me to come out of mental trauma I was going through.
I would highly recommend her.
reply_text: Thanks a lot ,wish you all the best .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: *** **** ************ ** ************* ****** * *********** I was very tensed about my 2nd conception and it's well being. I was searching for a good gynecologist. My search ended after meeting Dr. Vibha Arora, *** ** ** ****** ** **** ****** She gave me the best possible councelling and with her prescribed medications and care, I experienced a very healthy and safe pregnancy . With her care, I delivered a baby boy this year. *** ** *** **** * **** ****** *** **** * very good human being. Due to corona virus spread she took extra care in every means. She was always available on whatsapp and call so that I could avoid multiple  hospital visits during this testing time. Lastly I want to say about her that WHEN YOU ARE PREGNANT, DR. VIBHA TAKES CARE OF YOU LIKE A MOTHER.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Vibha is extremely caring, supportive and kind. Very professional and approachable. She will go out of her way to ensure that all matters are tactfully handled proactively. Making no room for errors or delays in identifying the issues. Best thing is she keeps the patient in mind and even do a phone call to check the health condition of the patient. Really want to "Thank" her for the efforts she put during my third trimester. Thank you for always being there whenever I require your help and support.
reply_text: Thanks for the kind words,in your case timely decision really helped us towards the best outcome and we can do that with our pts cooperation and so your trusting us helped us to do the best for baby.GOD BLESS YOU ALL.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy care and management,Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: I conceived through IVF and had a twin pregnancy . I was initially apprehensive this being my first pregnancy and a late one at that and started consultation with Dr Vibha Arora . She was extremely hands-on when finding out we were expecting twins, always available to take our queries any time of the day. An experience we will never forget! She guided me in my pregnancy nutrition and mental well being throughout with lots of patience.Thank you for making sure me and the twins were constantly being monitored with non-stress tests and ultrasounds- it was all worth it! The twins are beautiful and they are very healthy! I have had a very comfortable pregnancy, labour and delivery with my Doctor right by my side throughout. This was surely a memorable experience due to your care and expertise.
reply_text: Thanks Shreedevi your journey will always be close to my heart too.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
We had approached  Dr. Vibha Arora prior to planning our pregnancy. She provided complete support to the whole process at every step of the way. She was always supportive, available, approachable and a calming influence in the entire process.

She was always a phone call or message away. She helped us understand the entire process and we felt involved in every decision making.
We enjoyed meeting her *** ***** **** ** *********** ****** *** ** ***** *********** We felt safe and secured.

We were faced with an infection which led to an early labour and the way doctor Vibha handled the entire thing was exceptional. We felt she was always a call away during an emergency.  Her expertise and guidance has made our journey very much flawless.

We feel we were lucky to have such a wonderful doctor in our journey and no kind words would be enough to thank her for everything she has done for us!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Having a gynaecologist like Dr. Vibha Arora is a blessing in today's world. She provides comprehensive guidance for the patient and explains everything clearly. In addition to her professionalism, she provides a high level of care and attention to the patient with a smile on her face. Her expertise, knowledge, and commitment to providing the best care possible are truly impressive, and I am grateful for the opportunity to consult with her at Cloud Nine Hospital.

I feel more confident with my pregnancy knowing that she is always there for me. She always goes that extra mile to put the patient's convenience over everything else. * ***** ******** *** ** ** ************* *** **** *** ** *** **** ********* **** **

In every stage, Vibha Ma'am acted as our pillar of support and guided us through treatment and genuine advice. Frankly speaking, consulting Vibha Ma'am for our pregnancy was the best decision we made when we embarked on this beautiful journey.

Special thanks mam for being there with me in throughout of my journey.

Her advice ranged from food, medicine, supplements and very friendly approach and best part easily accessible. Sincerely thank her for her support in such trying circumstances.

review:
Dr vibha is one of the most caring and comforting doctors iv met..she takes care of every minute aspect of the patient and makes sure everythng is taken care off..she even makes that extra effort to call up and follow up herself thus taking care of the mother and the baby..she thus finally helped me deliver a beautiful baby boy into this world..

Apart from her expertise her friendly nature definately helps one open up with her and develop a bond

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: During our consultation and treatment experience, we have realised that Dr. Vibha Arora has the all-round knowledge, meticulous skill sets and vast experience in handling areas of Maternal, Obstetrics and Antenatal Care. A baby's growth is delicate and sensitive during the trimesters and requires special care and quicker response to any situation - in this regard, we and our baby have been pleasantly blessed to be in her expert care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I have been a patient of Dr Vibha since Dec'19. The best part about her is that she's very friendly and non-judgemetal. She treats with holistic approach. 
I have had PCOD since I was 11 years old, I have always had gyneacologists prescribe birth control pills to me. For 20 years, I had a tough time consuming those and all the side effects caused. 
When I started treatment with Dr Vibha 1.5 years back, she always prescribed right medication and never birth control pills.She is my favourite gynaecologist!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: First and foremost, thank you for the most precious gift you have given me. I remember your smile whenever I used to come to consult you which always brought a wave of peace to me.You never seemed to be in a hurry and showed true concern. What a wonderful blessing and encouragement you are. I don’t have words to thank you enough.The truly genuine nature of ur care...You put our needs, the patient and the family as ur priority. You have been a remarkable doctor n a friend.  I am blessed to have come your way. Thank u very much for ur excellent care and exceptional professional abilities
